text.div: This profile constrains the Patient resource for carrying the limited patient information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process. In RTPBC, the sole purpose of patient information is to enable the responding payer/PBM to locate the patient's insurance information. From there, pricing and coverage information is determined based on the patient's member and coverage information maintained by the payer.

name: CarinRtpbcRequestPatientInfo
title: CARIN RTPBC Request Patient Info
description: This profile constrains the Patient resource for carrying the limited patient information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process. In RTPBC, the sole purpose of patient information is to enable the responding payer/PBM to locate the patient's insurance information. From there, pricing and coverage information is determined based on the patient's member and coverage information maintained by the payer.

element.label: Patient gender
element.definition: The patient's administrative gender (male, female, other, unknown)

element.label: Patient address
element.comment: Address may be used by the payer to identify the patient's insurance records
Populate when not a US address

element.label: Patient given name(s)
element.definition: One or more given names of the patient
